attributes.action: To install camera,s in new cars as standard to catch people that damage your car when you,re not there
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many time,s have you come back from shopping or whatever to find that someone has damaged you,re car in a car park by reversing into it or throwing there door open causing unsightly dents.
If manufacturers installed camera,s in cars as standard you could then see who it is then claim off their insurance.
Also it could be used to catch criminals running past your car in the street,after they have robbed an house,or even more serious crimes.
There are cars everywhere,so if cameras were installed as standard,just think how many crimes could be solved.
So vote now if you want to look after your investments.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
